resources.string: "• ¥ 0.05 per minute for domestic calls and ¥ 0.3 for international. • Call any phone in the world, there are no carrier restrictions. • Top up and start calling, there are no complicated settings."
"Note: Every call requires 1KB of mobile data. Service and short numbers aren't supported. If you pay for incoming calls, you'll be charged by the carrier when roaming is on."
"Note: It can be used for international calls. Top-up package allows you to pay the same amount of money for 50 minutes of calls as you would've paid for 8 minutes without using this service."
